gameDetails.name: Stronghold: Heroes
gameDetails.description:
From the leaflet that comes with the game:

Instead of using the two standard heroes from the base game (the Officer and the Warrior), the Defender can choose to draw two random heroes from among the ten new ones available in this expansion.

The expansion is 10 heroes (5 Double-faced Cards )in a zip lock bag and an A5 size sheet of rules.
